title: Vegetarian nut loaf
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '100g mushrooms, brushed clean and diced (any kind)', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '2 large carrots, peeled and grated', '1 red or green pepper, diced', '5 organic eggs, beaten', '80g walnuts, roughly chopped', '40g pine nuts', '180g breadcrumbs', 'Pinch sea salt and black pepper', 'Pumpkin seeds, for the top']
